BISAM

Feb 2018 - Apr 2018

BISAM was a project aiming to update an old software architecture to ensure its better performance and stability. I had the opportunity during the project to work with Bi-Sam’s B-ONE, a system whose purpose is to translate complex input data into workable financial outputs for the business.

Activities

  • Design and encoding of test scenarios and their respective test cases within the VSTS tool
  • Elaboration of the global traceability between scenarios, test cases and bugs
  • Daily execution of specific tests
  • Collaboration with a developer for the starting phase of a BISAM test automation project
